sent.orig: Group Invite-Select a player list, then hit this button to invite them into your party.
sent.trans: 邀请组队-选择一个列表中的玩家，并使用这个功能邀请他们加入你的队伍。

sent.orig: Parents will want to invite many relatives, whereas you may want to invite more friends.
sent.trans: 父母想邀请很多亲戚，而你可能想多邀请些朋友。

sent.orig: Well, if you invite Alice, you should invite Frank, too.
sent.trans: 好的，如果你邀请爱丽丝，你也应该邀请弗兰克。

sent.orig: What did he say when you asked him why he didn't invite us ?
sent.trans: 你在他为什么不请我们去的时候，他怎么说？

sent.orig: Insofar as they took some action to invite the advertisement, they may even find it useful.
sent.trans: 在他们采取行动欢迎广告的范围内，他们甚至会发现它的用处。
